description: As an experienced provider of NGS services and a partner of Illumina, CD Genomics is committed to offering qualified metagenomic shotgun sequencing service. Shotgun metagenomic sequencing allows the taxonomic and biological functional characterization of polymicrobial communities in a cost-effective and time-efficient manner. We consistently deliver high-quality data with flexibility and bioinformatics analysis based on customers’ requirements.
name: Metagenomic Shotgun Sequencing
